item.title: Hamas frees three hostages as Israel begins releasing Palestinians
item.description: Palestinian militant group Hamas handed over three Israeli hostages on Saturday, whose gaunt appearance shocked Israelis.

item.title: Ukraine's Zelenskyy says 'Let's do a deal', offering Trump mineral partnership, seeking security
item.description: The Ukrainian president keen to speak to Trump before Putin does Ukraine proposes using its gas storage for U.S. LNG supplies.
